analyzed: ākāśagarbha nāma aṣṭottaraśata stotram
om namaḥ buddhāya
ākāśagarbha sattva artha mahāsattva mahā dyute
mahā ratna su ratna agrya vajra ratna namaḥ astu te
abhiṣeka mahā ratna mahā śuddha mahā śubha
buddha ratna viśuddha aṅga ratna ratna namaḥ astu te
ākāśa ākāśa saṃbhūta sarva ākāśa mahā nabha
ākāśa dhātu sarva āśa sarva āśā agrya namaḥ astu te
ratna saṃbhava ratna ūrṇa buddha ūrṇa su tathāgata
sarva ratna su sarva agrya ratna kārya namaḥ astu te
ratna ratna agrya ratna ugra ratna sarva tathāgata
ratna uttama mahā ākāśa sama ākāśa namaḥ astu te
alaṅkāra mahā śobha śobhā kara su śobhaka
śuddha sarva artha śuddhārtha dāna carya namaḥ astu te
dharma ratna viśuddha agrya saṅgha ratna tathāgata
mahā abhiṣeka loka artha pramoda artha namaḥ astu te

original: dāna pradāna dānāgrya tyāga tyāgāgrya dāyaka |
analyzed: dāna pradāna dāna agrya tyāga tyāga agrya dāyaka
sarva sattva artha tattva artha mahārtha artha namaḥ astu te
cintārāja mahā teja dānapāramitā ānaya
tathāgata mahāsattva sarva buddha namaḥ astu te
tathāgata mahā ratna tathāgata mahā prabha
tathāgata mahāketo mahā hāsa namaḥ astu te
tathāgata abhiṣeka ājña mahā abhiṣeka mahā vibho
lokanātha triloka agrya loka sūrya namaḥ astu te  /
ratna adhika adhikatara ratna bhūṣaṇa
ratna āloka mahā loka ratna kīrte namaḥ astu te
ratna utkara su ratna uttha maṇe vajra maṇe guṇa
ratna ākara su dīpta aṅga sarva ratna namaḥ astu te
sarva abhiprāya saṃprāpti ratna rāśi namaḥ astu te
abhvagrya vyāpi sarvātma vara prada mahā vara
vibhūte sarva saṃpatte vajra garbham namaḥ astu te
yaḥ kaścid dhārayet śivam
sarva buddha abhiṣekam tu sa prāpnoti anaghaḥ kṣaṇāt
śrī ākāśagarbha nāma aṣṭaśata adhyeṣaṇā stotram saṃpūrṇam
